name: old-school-reverse-extensions
title: Old School Reverse Extensions
primer: As the name suggests, this is an old classic exercise that hits the triceps hard.
steps: Lie down on a bench, on your back, with your head at one end.
Grasp a barbell with an underhand grip.
Move your arms beyond your head,Â keeping them in a straight line.
Bending only your elbows, slowly lower and raise the barbell.
